required_field: Please fill in the mandatory field (*)
error_load_section: Looks like there is a problem. Please contact your administrator
start_time_before_opening_hours: Start time is before the location opening hours
end_time_before_opening_hours: End time is before the location opening hours
start_time_after_closing_hours: Start time is after the location closing hours
end_time_after_closing_hours: End time is after the location closing hours
start_day_not_working_day: Selected start day is not a working day
end_day_not_working_day: Selected end day is not a working day
start_date_not_after_end_date: The start date cannot be later than the end date
start_date_not_in_past: The start date cannot be in the past
min_date: Should be after the start date
